name: Push The Box (itch)
description:
In this isometric game, you push around crates to reach the end diamond. Crates can be used to cross water or to trigger buttons or to reach higher places. In some instances, you have to think smart to utilize a crate. The player and crates can make use of a lift-block that takes you to a higher place in the level.

The game is fully 3D so the camera can be rotated in both directions. Don’t worry you can’t die in this game and if you make a wrong move you can undo every wrong turn. 

If you enjoyed this game, please consider purchasing one of my games on steam.

Follow me on twitter.
